job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Would you like to join an awardwinning company which is changing and building the future telecom providing ALLG cloudnative OpenRAN portfolio in their bestinclass products Read on if your answer is YESltbrgtltbrgtMy client a world leading Telco vendor is currently seeking a Sr Layer23 Stack SW Engineer with 7 years of CC development of embedded realtime components and good understanding of 5GLTE standard exposure to help expand my clients offering across the globe This is a great opportunity to join an organization dedicated to its customer base through its desire to deliver disruptive Radio productsltbrgtltbrgtWhat you MUST bring to the teamltbrgtltbrgt	MUST 7 plus years experience in CC programming language development of embeddedrealtime components of a multithreaded systemltbrgt	Possess strong foundation in troubleshooting and debugging activities in endtoend software development cycleltbrgt	Ability to work independently without close supervision and act as a part of a global team in a multisite organizationltbrgt	Demonstrates good understanding of communication protocols  Ability to translate L2L3 standards and specifications towards efficient implementationltbrgt	Solid handson experience with SW development methodologies Design documentation SW implementation unit testing etcltbrgt	Essential to have strong communication skillsltbrgt	MUST BSc in Computer Science  Computer Engineering or top IDF SW development unitltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtNice to haveltbrgt	Experience in Linux OS user application developmentltbrgt	Past experience with telecom communication standards preferable 4G5Gltbrgt	Past experience with ContainersdockersKubernetes K8S technologiesltbrgt	Experienced with RAN associated test equipments such as UE simulatorsQXDMltbrgt	Experience with cellular modems  design implementation etcltbrgt
